title: The Antiquary - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Or he may have been hypercritical enough to think thatElspeth of the Burnfoot is the Meg of the romance.

title: The Antiquary - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The skilful contrasts are perhaps most remarkable when we compareElspeth of the Burnfoot with the gossiping old women in the post-officeat Fairport,--a town studied perhaps from Arbroath.
